summary: This is an email chain regarding scheduling a legal visit for Jeffrey Epstein at the Metropolitan Correctional Center. Supervisory Staff Attorney at the MCC confirms arrangements for attorney Bruce Barket to visit Epstein on July 15, 2019, at 8:00 AM.

persons.name: Bruce Barket
persons.context: Attorney requesting and confirming a visit with his client, Jeffrey Epstein, at the Metropolitan Correctional Center. He is a partner at the law firm Barket, Epstein, Kearon, Aldea & LoTurco.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Referred to by his inmate number (78514-054) and initials 'MI'. He is the incarcerated individual for whom the attorney visit is being scheduled.

connections.description: Bruce Barket is arranging a legal visit with his client, Jeffrey Epstein, who is incarcerated at the MCC.

events.title: Scheduled Attorney Visit for Jeffrey Epstein
events.description: A legal visit is scheduled for attorney Bruce Barket to meet with his client, Jeffrey Epstein, at the Metropolitan Correctional Center at 8:00 AM.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, 150 Park Row, New York, New York 10007
Barket, Epstein, Kearon, Aldea & LoTurco, 666 Old Country Road, Garden City, NY 11530
keyFacts: The document is an email regarding scheduling a legal visit for Jeffrey Epstein while he was incarcerated at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York.
The visit was scheduled for July 15, 2019, at 8:00 AM, just weeks before Epstein's death in August 2019.
Epstein is referred to by his inmate number, 78514-054, and the initials 'MI'.
Bruce Barket of the law firm Barket, Epstein, Kearon, Aldea & LoTurco was one of Epstein's defense attorneys.
The correspondence highlights the logistical coordination between defense counsel and prison staff for attorney-client meetings.
